content.body: I've prototyped the scope mapping proposal for the VS Code debug adapter for Firefox: https://github.com/hbenl/vscode-firefox-debug/tree/tc39-scope-mapping . And here is an example with which you can try this out: https://github.com/hbenl/tc39-scope-mapping-examples .

Hi folks, jkup is away today so I'll be subbing in to facilitate the naming track meeting today. Just as a reminder it's scheduled in about 30m in the usual zoom: https://bloomberg.zoom.us/j/98319586084?pwd=Skwyejc3bDBMRnY5ZlBqaUp0VzFBQT09
